## blockRendering.Drawer.drawValueInput\_() method

Add steps for an external value input, rendered as a notch in the side of the block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected drawValueInput_(row: Row): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  row | [Row](./blockly.blockrendering.row.md) | The row that this input belongs to. |

void
